grapher 0.1.0

Generate data

generate.Rd

Generate nodes and links.

make_nodes(
  n = 100,
  colors = c("#B1E2A3", "#98D3A5", "#328983", "#1C5C70", "#24C96B")
)

make_links(nodes)

make_data(
  n = 100,
  colors = c("#B1E2A3", "#98D3A5", "#328983", "#1C5C70", "#24C96B")
)

Arguments

n

Number of nodes.
colors

Color palette to use.
nodes

Nodes, as generated by sg_make_nodes.

Value

tibble of nodes or links or a list of the latter.

Functions

  • make_nodes generate data.frame nodes.

  • make_links generate data.frame edges.

  • make_data generate list of nodes and edges.

Examples

graph_data <- make_data()
head(graph_data) # structure
#> $nodes
#> # A tibble: 100 x 4
#>    id    label  size color  
#>    <chr> <chr> <dbl> <chr>  
#>  1 1     Y77      21 #ffaa0e
#>  2 2     E31      24 #8a60b0
#>  3 3     F6       39 #ba43b4
#>  4 4     W75      11 #ff7f0e
#>  5 5     H86      22 #ffaa0e
#>  6 6     U21      18 #d63a3a
#>  7 7     G85      28 #1f83b4
#>  8 8     L38      46 #ffbf50
#>  9 9     K37      19 #ffbf50
#> 10 10    L64      32 #bcbd22
#> # … with 90 more rows
#> 
#> $links
#> # A tibble: 100 x 3
#>    source target hidden
#>    <chr>  <chr>  <lgl> 
#>  1 1      7      FALSE 
#>  2 2      71     FALSE 
#>  3 3      71     FALSE 
#>  4 4      9      FALSE 
#>  5 5      77     FALSE 
#>  6 6      44     FALSE 
#>  7 7      61     FALSE 
#>  8 8      42     FALSE 
#>  9 9      18     FALSE 
#> 10 10     61     FALSE 
#> # … with 90 more rows
#> 

# graph
graph(graph_data)
